item.description:
Field Trip

New England Pagans & Witches presents it's annual Harvest Concert Series featuring Kellianna, Wendy Rule, and Tim Van Diest.

Harvest some magickal music into your life.

Contact us for tickets at nepwevents@yahoo.com

When: August 12th. 2012
Time: Doors open at 1pm

Tickets are only $25 each to see all 3 talented musicians!

CD's will be available to purchase.

Directions: Use your GPS or Mapquest

Derry - Salem Elks which is on the Windham and Salem NH line.
39 Shadow Lake Rd in Salem NH 03079

http://www.bpoe2226.org/directions.html
item.name: Harvest Concert Series featuring Kellianna, Wendy Rule, and Tim Van Diest
